import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import MedicineSearch from "../components/MedicineSearch"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CategorySection from "../components/CategorySection"; import CategoryNavbar from "../components/CategoryNavbar"; import PersonalCare from "../components/personalcare/PersonalCare"; import api from "../api/axios"; import "bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min"; function Home() { const [scrolled, setScrolled] = useState(false); const [query, setQuery] = useState(""); const [suggestions, setSuggestions] = useState([]); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState("Medicines"); const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")); // ✅ Scroll effect useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => setScrolled(window.scrollY > 150); window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); }, []); // ✅ Search Suggestions useEffect(() => { const fetchSuggestions = async () => { if (query.trim().length < 2) return setSuggestions([]); try { const res = await api.get("/medicines/search", { params: { q: query } }); setSuggestions(res.data); } catch (err) { console.error("Search error:", err.message); } }; const debounce = setTimeout(fetchSuggestions, 300); return () => clearTimeout(debounce); }, [query]); const renderCategorySection = () => { switch (selectedCategory) { case "Personal Care": return ; default: return ; } }; return (
{/* ✅ HERO CAROUSEL */}
{/* ✅ OVERLAY SEARCH BAR */}

Welcome to MediQ

Your trusted pharmacy partner – search, order & manage medicines online.

{/* ✅ SEARCH RESULTS */} {suggestions.length > 0 && (
Showing results for: {query}
{suggestions.map((med) => (
{med.name}

Category: {med.category}

Symptoms: {med.symptoms?.join(", ")}

{med.description}

Price: ₹{med.price}

))}
)} {/* ✅ CATEGORY NAVBAR */} {/* ✅ DYNAMIC CATEGORY SECTION */} {renderCategorySection()} {/* ✅ FEATURES */}

🔎 Search Medicines

Find medicines by name, category, or symptoms easily.

📤 Upload Prescription

Upload doctor’s prescription for pharmacist approval.

🛒 Easy Orders

Buy approved medicines in one click or select only what you need.

{/* ✅ QUICK LINKS */}
Browse Medicines {user?.role !== "pharmacist" && ( <> Upload Prescription View Orders 👤 My Profile )} {user?.role === "pharmacist" && ( Pharmacist Dashboard )}
{/* ✅ ABOUT SECTION */} {/* ✅ FOOTER SECTION */}
); } // ✅ Carousel Styling function carouselStyle(imageUrl) { return { backgroundImage: `url('${imageUrl}')`, backgroundSize: "cover", backgroundPosition: "center", height: "70vh", }; } // ✅ About Section function AboutSection() { return (

Stay Healthy with MediQ: Kerala's Trusted Online Pharmacy and Healthcare Platform

We Bring Care Closer

MediQ is built on a mission to simplify healthcare for every Indian household. With over 31 million orders delivered across 1800+ cities, we’ve become a trusted name in digital pharmacy.

Medicines at Your Doorstep

With a catalog of over 2 lakh medicines and health essentials, MediQ offers everything from life-saving prescriptions to daily wellness items. Our partnerships with licensed pharmacies ensure authenticity and quality.

Ayurveda for Everyday Wellness

At MediQ, we honor India’s rich tradition of holistic healing by offering a dedicated Ayurveda section. From immunity boosters to stress relief, discover trusted remedies for balanced living.

The Pharmacist at Your Fingertips

Our certified pharmacists are available online to validate prescriptions, ensure safety, and provide dosage guidance — making MediQ your reliable healthcare companion.

Stay Healthy!
); } // ✅ Footer Section function FooterSection() { return (
